usecase.name: Registration
usecase.scenario: When a user wants to sign up our website
steps: users have to submit a form mentioning unique email,password,name,photo,phone,role,gender and birth type
admin cross check these infos and give a activation mail to the user if the information is ok

testcases.name: valid registration
testcases.description: varify that user successfully register to the website

input.email: have to give a unique email
input.password: have to give a strong password with at least 6 character
input.name: name is also required
input.photo: Photo of the user have required
input.phone: Have to give a phone number

testcases.name: invalid Registration
testcases.description: varify that user gives all the required information to the website properly

testcases.name: Admin approval
testcases.description: varify that admin can successfully approves a user registration

testcases.name: Admin rejection
testcases.description: varify that admin can reject a user registration
